intro: Memecylon varians var. rotundifolium, commonly known as the round-leaved memecylon, is a species of flowering plant in the family Meliaceae. It is characterized by its elliptic to ovate leaves that are often rounded at the base. The plant typically grows in tropical and subtropical regions, thriving in humid, shaded environments. Its flowers are small and clustered, often in panicles, and are usually greenish-yellow in color. The fruit is a woody capsule that contains several seeds.
